name: Towering Titan
aura: Increases Ally HP in All Battles by 25%.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Shieldsplitter
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.desc: Attacks 4 times at random. The first hit has a 100% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Each of the other hits has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
skills.name: Flailing Assault
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Damage +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, as well as a [Shield] buff on this Champion equal to 30% of their MAX HP for 3 turns. Grants an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Bullish Vitality
skills.books:
Level 2: Shield +5%
Level 3: Shield +5%
Level 4: Shield +10%
Level 5: Shield +10%
Level 6: Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Will transfer 50% of the damage inflicted on Cagebreaker to this Champion during battle.

[Only available when Cagebreaker is on the same team. If multiple Cagebreakers are on the team, this Champion will only transfer the damage from one of them.]
skills.name: Battle Brothers [P]
